Title: Relates to the removal of adolescent offenders to family court; and relates to jurisdiction of family court
Summary: Limits the circumstances under which the case of an adolescent offender may be removed to family court; limits the jurisdiction of family court with respect to certain repeat adolescent offenders.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the removal of adolescent offenders to family court; and to amend the family court act, in relation to jurisdiction
